data.name: Battlecursed
data.detailed_description:
Battlecursed is an uncompromising dungeon crawler from a first-person perspective in a gritty and immersive 3D environment.  Gameplay pits players against an onslaught of dark fantasy inspired enemies as they lead their own unique combination of hired mercenary heroes through a cursed labyrinth that has claimed the lives of thousands.

Players will explore the intricate histories of Pylandria as they unravel the mysteries shrouding the identity of an evil tyrant loath to release his grasp on life and power, and the even more ancient evil that drives him.  Through relentless combat and exploration, players will uncover the secrets of their adversary as they strive to break his millennium long curse.

BUILD YOUR PARTY
Recruit and customize a party of adventurers to face the recently risen Lich Lord Xelo Van. Choose from multiple classes, and equip weapons and artifacts to further enhance their abilities.

ROGUELIKE GAME ELEMENTS
Tactical choices, permadeath, and split-second life or death decisions add roguelike game elements to this hybrid ARPG/dungeon crawler.

CUSTOM PROGRESSION
Guild and settlement upgrades allow players to personalize hero abilities and gameplay. Spend your gold and glory to unlock secret knowledge and hidden powers.

GENERATED DUNGEON ADVENTURES
Procedural labyrinths and a wide variety of quests and objectives create constantly changing adventures. Xelo Van's nightmarish dungeon is never without some new threat...

REAL-TIME COMBAT
Engage in fast-paced, real-time combat against Xelo Van's monstrous army.

COMING SOON
Will you answer the call?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10, 32 or 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual core Intel/AMD CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, 2GB VRAM, Geforce GT 740, Radeon HD 5770 video card, AMD A4, Intel HD4000 with DX11, 1280 x 720 resolution
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows 7 compatible sound
